    • Method Detail

      • setVisibility

        protected boolean setVisibility(org.bukkit.entity.Player observer,
                                int entityID,
                                boolean visible)
        Set the visibility status of a given entity for a particular observer.
        Parameters:
        observer - - the observer player.
        entity - - ID of the entity that will be hidden or made visible.
        visible - - TRUE if the entity should be made visible, FALSE if not.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the entity was visible before this method call, FALSE otherwise.

      • setMembership

        protected boolean setMembership(org.bukkit.entity.Player observer,
                                int entityID,
                                boolean member)
        Add or remove the given entity and observer entry from the table.
        Parameters:
        observer - - the player observer.
        entityID - - ID of the entity.
        member - - TRUE if they should be present in the table, FALSE otherwise.
        Returns:
        TRUE if they already were present, FALSE otherwise.

        entityID - - ID of the entity.
        Returns:

      • toggleEntity

        public final boolean toggleEntity(org.bukkit.entity.Player observer,
                                  org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Toggle the visibility status of an entity for a player.

        If the entity is visible, it will be hidden. If it is hidden, it will become visible.

        Parameters:
        observer - - the player observer.
        entity - - the entity to toggle.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the entity was visible before, FALSE otherwise.

      • showEntity

        public final boolean showEntity(org.bukkit.entity.Player observer,
                                org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Allow the observer to see an entity that was previously hidden.
        Parameters:
        observer - - the observer.
        entity - - the entity to show.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the entity was hidden before, FALSE otherwise.

      • hideEntity

        public final boolean hideEntity(org.bukkit.entity.Player observer,
                                org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Prevent the observer from seeing a given entity.
        Parameters:
        observer - - the player observer.
        entity - - the entity to hide.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the entity was previously visible, FALSE otherwise.

      • canSee

        public final boolean canSee(org.bukkit.entity.Player observer,
                            org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Determine if the given entity has been hidden from an observer.

        Note that the entity may very well be occluded or out of range from the perspective of the observer. This method simply checks if an entity has been completely hidden for that observer.

        Parameters:
        observer - - the observer.
        entity - - the entity that may be hidden.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the player may see the entity, FALSE if the entity has been hidden.
